attributes.action: A wage for Medical/NHS University Students
attributes.additional_details: Medical students are working the same shifts and doing most of the same jobs as qualified medical staff. This is a full 48 hours a week for most students and not being paid a single penny. With working these placement shifts in order to pass the year there is very limited time to have a second job outside of placement. As well as trying to support their education for university and a family for some. This means that some are unable to pay bills, afford transportation to the placements/university
attributes.background: To pay all students that are working on a medical ward or in an ambulance a wage whether it is apprenticeship or a little lower.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Ensure Student Nurses are paid whilst on placement: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554624

Ensure student nurses and midwives are paid for working during Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/558625

Ensure all Health Care Students are paid during placements during Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555178

Ensure medical and dental students are paid whilst on placement: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/556132
